titles.title: Congratulating the University of Connecticut Huskies for winning the 2003 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I women's basketball championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Committee on Education and the Workforce discharged.
Mr. Simmons asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 187.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 4/11/2003--Passed House without amendment. (This measure has not been amended since being introduced in the House on April 9, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Commends the University of Connecticut Huskies women's basketball team for winning the 2003 National Collegiate Athletic Association Division I women's basketball championship and for completing the 2002-2003 season with a 37-1 record.
